## Source: amazon-inspector (a6c36ba7964bc7d977fc3eba85d86488002805ca4ffddddb94863afd1b754902)
The package volume-viz was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a13dee8d55faf159c6efdf940a6f18f7ee69ff8846204a4e922ee879b998181d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'volume-viz' @ 5.5.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
